hero.title: One Platform to Connect the Entire Agricultural Supply Chain.
hero.subtitle: From farm to fork, DamDoh is the integrated ecosystem for producers, buyers, logistics partners, and financial institutions to transact with trust and efficiency.

howItWorks.title: Simple, Powerful, Connected
howItWorks.subtitle: A unified workflow for a seamless supply chain.

step1.title: Create & Verify
step1.description: Farmers log activities, creating a verifiable, VTI-backed history for every batch. Input suppliers list certified products. Service providers showcase their expertise.

step2.title: Discover & Connect
step2.description: Buyers find trusted, traceable produce. Logistics partners find shipping jobs. Financial institutions discover low-risk investment opportunities.

step3.title: Transact & Thrive
step3.description: Execute deals with confidence through a transparent platform. Build your reputation, expand your network, and grow your business.

trustPillars.title: Built on a Foundation of Trust
trustPillars.subtitle: Our four pillars ensure every interaction on the DamDoh platform is secure, transparent, and reliable.

traceability.title: VTI-Verified Traceability
traceability.description: Every product batch is tracked from seed to sale with a Verifiable Traceability ID, ensuring unparalleled transparency.

network.title: Secure Stakeholder Network
network.description: Connect with a verified network of farmers, buyers, and service providers, all vetted for quality and reliability.

ai.title: AI-Powered Risk Management
ai.description: Leverage AI-driven credit scoring and market insights to make smarter, data-backed business decisions.

security.title: Ironclad Data Security
security.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and granular privacy controls, giving you peace of mind.

stakeholders.title: For Every Link in the Chain
stakeholders.subtitle: DamDoh is designed to create value for every participant in the agricultural ecosystem.

farmers.name: Producers
farmers.headline: Access new markets and increase your profitability.

points.title: Sell Directly to Buyers
points.desc: List your VTI-verified produce on the marketplace to reach a wider audience of premium buyers.

points.title: Access Fair Finance
points.desc: Build a data-backed reputation to qualify for loans and insurance from our financial partners.

points.title: Optimize Your Farm
points.desc: Use AI tools for crop diagnosis, KNF/FGW guides, and profitability tracking.

buyers.name: Buyers
buyers.headline: Source high-quality, traceable products with confidence.

points.title: Verify Product Origins
points.desc: Use the VTI system to see the complete journey of a product, from farm to you.

points.title: Find Reliable Suppliers
points.desc: Connect directly with trusted farmers and cooperatives with proven track records.

points.title: Streamline Your Sourcing
points.desc: Manage orders, communication, and logistics all in one unified platform.

logistics.name: Logistics
logistics.headline: Find more jobs and optimize your routes.

points.title: Discover Shipping Jobs
points.desc: Get access to a steady stream of transport requests from farmers and buyers on the platform.

points.title: Plan Efficient Routes
points.desc: Utilize platform data to optimize delivery routes and reduce fuel costs.

points.title: Build Your Reputation
points.desc: Gain ratings and reviews for on-time deliveries to attract more business.

financial.name: Financial Institutions
financial.headline: De-risk agricultural lending and expand your portfolio.

points.title: Access Verified Farmer Data
points.desc: Make informed lending decisions using our AI-powered credit scoring based on real farm performance data.

points.title: Offer Tailored Products
points.desc: List your loan and insurance products directly to a targeted audience of qualified farmers.

points.title: Monitor Your Portfolio
points.desc: Track the performance of your agricultural loans and gain insights into regional trends.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Leaders Across the Supply Chain

t1.quote: DamDoh's traceability system has been a game-changer for our cooperative. We can now prove the origin and quality of our coffee, which has opened up new premium export markets and increased our members' incomes.
t1.name: Maria Rodriguez

t2.quote: As an institutional lender, our biggest challenge has always been assessing the risk of smallholder farmers. DamDoh's data-driven credit scoring is revolutionary. It's the future of agricultural finance.
t2.name: David Ochieng

t3.quote: The efficiency gains are massive. We find reliable transport partners, manage shipments, and communicate with suppliers all in one place. DamDoh is the operating system for our supply chain.
t3.name: Priya Sharma

cta.title: Join the Future of Agriculture
cta.subtitle: Create your profile and discover a more connected, transparent, and profitable way to do business.

searchPage.title: Search
searchPage.description: Find anything on the DamDoh platform.

modal.title: Universal Search
modal.placeholder: Search for products, services, people, forums...
modal.searchErrorDescription: An error occurred while performing your search.
modal.scanErrorDescription: Please ensure the code is well-lit and within frame.
modal.invalidCodeError: The scanned QR code is not valid for this action.

AppHeader.searchPlaceholder: Search for products, services, or people...

logOut.title: Logged Out
logOut.description: You have been successfully logged out.
logOut.failDescription: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting agriculture from seed to table.

offline.title: You're currently offline
offline.description: Your actions will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing offline changes...
syncing.description: Processing {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} that were saved while you were offline.

synced.title: Sync Complete
synced.description: All offline changes have been successfully saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync offline changes. Will try again later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: You are offline. This action will be performed when you reconnect.

tooltip.syncing: Syncing {count, plural, one {# pending action} other {# pending actions}}...
tooltip.onlinePending: Online | {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} waiting to sync
tooltip.offline: Offline | {count, plural, one {# action} other {# actions}} queued

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Or recover access with your Universal ID
Auth.signUpDescription: Tell us a bit about yourself to get started.
Auth.namePlaceholder: e.g., Chan Nary or Green Valley Farms
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your role in the supply chain...
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No problem. Enter your email address below, and we'll send you a link to reset it.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter and confirm your new password below.

recoverPage.title: Recover Your Account
recoverPage.description: Use your network to regain access.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Once your friend scans the code to verify your identity, you'll regain access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh contact scan this QR code using the 'Help a Friend Recover' feature in their app.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and expires in 10 minutes.

enterPhone.title: Enter Your Phone Number
enterPhone.description: We'll use this to find your account and start the recovery process.
enterPhone.genericError: Could not start recovery. Please check the number and try again.

helpFriend.prompt: Need to help a friend recover their account?
helpFriend.scanError: The scanned code is not a valid DamDoh recovery code.
helpFriend.scanFail: Could not read the QR code. Please try again.

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: A password reset link has been sent to {email}.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescriptionIfAccountExists: If an account with {email} exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the password reset link.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

resetPassword.successDescription: You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.successRedirect: You will be redirected to the sign-in page shortly.

errors.missingCode: Invalid password reset link. Please request a new one.
errors.missingCodeDescription: The password reset link is missing or invalid. Please return to the 'Forgot Password' page to request a new one.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidOrExpiredCode: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.userDisabled: This user account has been disabled.
errors.userNotFound: No user found corresponding to this reset link.
errors.weakPassword: The new password is not strong enough.

errors.invalidCredential: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
errors.userDisabled: This user account has been disabled.
errors.emailInUse: An account with this email already exists.
errors.emailInUseRich: An account with this email already exists. Please {signInLink} or use a different email.
errors.weakPassword: The password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.

signUpSuccess.title: Account Created!
signUpSuccess.description: Welcome to {appName}! You have been signed in.

checkInError.notRegistered: {guestName} does not have a booking for this service.

ErrorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
ErrorPage.description: We're sorry, but an unexpected error occurred. You can try to reload the page or go back to the homepage.
